attributes.action: Introduce a 10p charge at cafes for single-use disposable cups
attributes.additional_details:
1 in 5 people visit a coffee shop daily

2.5 billion coffee cups are thrown away each year

0.25% are recycled

500,000 are littered every day

25,000 tonnes of waste in landfill in a year
attributes.background:
The 5p charge on plastic bags has reduced plastic bag usage by 83%.
Studies show that people are more likely to respond extra charges than they do to discounts. Rather than offering a discount for bringing a reusable cup, a 10p charge on every cup would be a much more effective way to reduce waste.
